document.full_text: president of hu jintao of china praised north korea and its ailing leader, kim jong-il, for giving 'top priority to improving people's lives,' according to the chinese state news agency.
document.title: china hails north korean leader as he tours country
lines_and_colors: president of hu jintao of china praised north korea and its ailing leader, kim jong-il, for giving 'top priority to improving people's lives,' according to the chinese state news agency.
